stanza.line: They that have power to hurt and will do (a)none(/a)
That do not do the thing they most do (b)show(/b)
Who moving others are themselves as (a)stone(/a)
Tibey are the lords and owners of their (c)faces(/c)
The summer's flower is to the summer (e)sweet(/e)
Though to it self it only live and (f)die(/f)
But if that flower with base infection (e)meet(/e)
For sweetest things turn sourest by their (g)deeds(/g)
Lilies that fester smell far worse than (g)weeds(/g)
